sentences.en: Danny could be very jealous and possessive about me.
sentences.cn: 丹尼很爱吃醋，对我的占有欲很强。

sentences.en: He has a strong possessive instinct.
He sometimes felt as if the family's bolt was shot, their possessive instinct dying out.
sentences.cn: 他有时觉得这个家族的干劲已经耗尽, 他们的占有本能已经在消逝.

sentences.en: He used to ring his possessive mother several times a day.
sentences.cn: 他母亲控制欲很强，过去他常常一天给她打好几次电话。

sentences.en: He was very possessive towards her.
It is often used with a possessive adjective.
sentences.cn: 这一词常与所有格的形容词连用.
爱是从不把对方当作财产占有.

sentences.en: My son is very possessive about [ of ] his mother.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子想 独占 他的母亲.

sentences.en: People were very possessive about their coupons.
Possessive adjectives are used to modify nouns that follow the possessive adjectives.
sentences.cn: 拥有格形容词是用作修饰其后跟随的名词.

sentences.en: Possessive personal pronouns are used to show ownership or possession.
sentences.cn: 拥有格代名词用作表达物件之拥有权.

sentences.en: Some parents are too possessive of their children.
sentences.cn: 有些父母过分要求子女百依百顺。

sentences.en: The possessive instinct never stands still.
sentences.cn: 占有欲是从来不会停止不前的.
